XASutils module¶

The xasutils module offers the following XAFS utility functions :

Function

Description

etok()

Converts energies to wavenumbers.

ktoe()

Converts wavenumbers to energies.
araucaria.xas.xasutils.etok(energy)¶

Converts photo-electron energies to wavenumbers.

Parameters

energy (ndarray) – Array of photo-electron energies.

Return type

ndarray

Returns

Arary of photo-electron wavenumbers.

Example

>>> from araucaria.xas import etok
>>> e = 400      # eV
>>> k = etok(e)  # A^{-1}
>>> print('%1.5f' % k)
10.24633
araucaria.xas.xasutils.ktoe(k)¶

Converts photo-electron wavenumbers to energies.

Parameters

k (ndarray) – Array with photo-electron wavenumbers.

Return type

ndarray

Returns

Array with photo-electron energies.

Example

>>> from araucaria.xas import ktoe
>>> k = 10      # A^{-1}
>>> e = ktoe(k)  # eV
>>> print('%1.5f' % e)
380.99821
